name: Elegant Chateau in the Heart of the Perigord
description:
DESCRIPTION
With a capacity of 100 beds and only 800 meters from the Lascaux caves in the heart of the Périgord Noir, how can you not make the most of this sumptuous castle on the occasion of your wedding?
The Château is a treasure to share, and it is your turn to celebrate your dream day. With a warm and professional welcome, the team in charge of helping you in the organization of your ceremony nuptials will enhance your festivity with unique services and charming spaces.
Spaces and capacities
Nestled in lush greenery in the heart of the Périgord Noir, the Château welcomes you to celebrate a unique wedding in a natural and authentic setting as you have always dreamed of. Surrounded by fields, on the edge of the Vézère and a stone's throw from the Lascaux Caves, this magical site is located in a huge 10 hectare wooded park where you can organize your party in the castle, welcoming 100 seated guests.
The 130 m2 room can accommodate between 20 and 100 people depending on the mode of meal, plate or buffet. A second room for your cocktail or brunch will be ideal for 100 people seated. For the modalities, do not hesitate to contact your hosts. Wherever you are, you will spend a very friendly moment with high quality services.
The ground floor of the castle, accessible to disabled people, offers you several possibilities. Two large renovated rooms will house your bridal party inside the establishment, also giving access to outdoor spaces such as the 10-hectare park, its hundred-year-old trees, and the swimming pool.
Benefits
The house provides you with all the dining equipment as well as a kitchen area that has won over more than one caterer. Taste the regional gastronomy famous for its foie gras, cheeses and refined truffles. You can also benefit from:
Personalized organization of the reception
100 beds distributed in the castle and in apartment lodgings
Chapel or tent depending on the number of guests
Floral decoration
Musical entertainment with DJ
Services of makeup artists, photographer and videographer
Optional security service
Child care and entertainment
Parking 70 cars
The wedding package will be modified as you wish so as to best meet your expectations. They include the catering service for the gastronomic part of the D-day, the possibility of organizing a cocktail and a reception, having a reception room, a grass terrace and a tent, decorating furnishings and plan a musical evening until 5 a.m. with no time limit. Meal options vary from € 35 and up to € 70 per person depending on your tastes and we do allow you to bring your own wine with an additional corkage fee.
You can also opt for a fireworks display at the end of the day or a romantic trip in a helicopter or hot air balloon if you wish and will be put in contact with the providers that you need to perfect your wedding event.
Housing service
You have the possibility of being accommodated in rooms of the castle or gites great comfort totally equipped within the Gentilhommière. Most of them overlook the park on the Vézère side or the swimming pool and the hill of Lascaux. Up to 100 people can be comfortably accommodated for the night. For your pleasure, you can enjoy relaxing in the hammam, the sauna or the spa area, not forgetting the 14/7 outdoor swimming pool.
Geographic location
A few hundred meters from the famous Lascaux caves in the Périgord Noir, erected on the banks of the Vézère river, this 1860 site surrounded by wilderness benefits from an exceptional location and accessibility. This will allow you to visit Sarlat, Les Eyzies and Brive, cities located a few minutes from the castle, as well as the 300 tourist sites of Dordogne.
Located 4 hours from Paris; and 2 hours from Bordeaux.
